comments.body: [~pxiong], could you take a look? Thanks
LGTM +1. I think we do not have any better solution so far for Hive until next release of Calcite.

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12777282/HIVE-12662.patch

{color:red}ERROR:{color} -1 due to 17 failed/errored test(s), 9895 tests executed
